command_permission.list.gui.help.lore:
<green>Left click -> Allow all players to use this command
<green>Right click -> Disallow all players to use this command
<green>Middle click -> Unset the command requirement override.
command_permission.command.set_true: <orange>Issue the command to <red>allow<orange> all players to use the command `%s`: %s <hover:show_text:'<green>Copy to clipboard'><click:copy_to_clipboard:'%s'><green>[COPY]</click></hover>
command_permission.command.set_false: <orange>Issue the command to<green> disallow <orange>all players to use the command `%s`: %s <hover:show_text:'<green>Copy to clipboard'><click:copy_to_clipboard:'%s'><green>[COPY]</click></hover>
command_permission.command.unset: <orange>Issue the command to <green>unset<orange> the requirement for command `%s`: %s <hover:show_text:'<green>Copy to clipboard'><click:copy_to_clipboard:'%s'><green>[COPY]</click></hover>
